ygData.subject: Re: By the way
ygData.msgSnippet: wow.....thanks for the referral.  I am a member of the Mystic Alliance on RN and have to say I have had a wonderful time with them.  Eveyrone is very friendly
ygData.messageBody:
wow.....thanks for the referral. I am a member of the Mystic Alliance
on RN and have to say I have had a wonderful time with them. Eveyrone
is very friendly and helpful and looking out for each other.

The guild is not strictly gay, but a majority of the members are and
those who are not are gay friendly. Everyone is always willing to
help when they can and there is no line between "gay and straight" we
are all simply "guildmates"

If you get a chance, create a character and come on over for a visit.
Don't have to join and if one of our lowbies or newbies is around you
guys can group!



--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., Christina Norman <tina@a...> wrote:
>
> One idea you can do is transfering your characters.
>
> No not really, you can't really transfer characters, but you can
make new
> people with the same look and the same class and the same name.
>
> And you will find that the second time you play a class, it is much
easier
> to progress than the first time!
>
> I recommend everyone at least try playing on RN, to experience what
it's
> like playing in the guild.
>
> Christina
>
> On Sun, 1 Apr 2001 sirenuvsavannah@y... wrote:
>
> > While I would love to get to know all of you, I am having a hard
time
> > with the idea of giving up characters I have rasied and grown to
love
> > on Mithaniel Marr... so... if there are any GLBT players on that
> > server, please feel free to look me up and say hi!
> >
> > Quanyin (Female) Human Monk - 20
> > Pyderi (male) Half-elf Warrior - 8
> >
> > I have been lucky enough to find one person on that server to talk
> > to, and he's not even gay! so kudos to him.
> >
> > Also, feel free to email me ... @ divamae@h...
> >
> > Take care!
> >
> > Bryen
> >
> >
> >
> >

http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
